//: Capping these at 1000 L and kg to prevent bodies and meat disappearing and vision at 50 for less aggro
description: a dinosaur
Small, thin predatory bipedal dinosaur with a long head and sharp teeth and long grasping claws.
A medium dinosaur with sharp teeth and two prominent bony crests on its head.
A large, fast predatory bipedal dinosaur, decorated with three colorful horns on its head and dotted with bright skin bones with long sharp teeth and a long flexible tail.
A huge dinosaur about the size of a small house, with a ferocious crocodile-like head and a sail on its back.
A large bipedal predator dinosaur with a large head, long sharp teeth, short strong arms, and long tail.
A large bipedal dinosaur with a mouth full of sharp serrated teeth.
Huge predatory bipedal dinosaur with a tall ridge running the length of its back covered with heavy muscles.  Its teeth are curved and serrated like sawblades.
Huge predatory bipedal dinosaur with long claws and strong arms for grappling.
Large sharp teeth and a lean frame, with long wicked claws and a feathered mullet and tail.
Enormous teeth, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, with two small arms and a feathered mullet and tail.  The snout is long with six ridges.
Enormous teeth, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, with two small arms and a feathered mullet and tail.
Enormous teeth, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, with short arms and a feathered mullet and tail.
This large, bipedal, feather-covered dinosaur has a long, gator-like mouth with sharp teeth.
Bipedal dinosaur with long sharp teeth in a massive jaw, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, short arms, with a feathered white mullet and tail.
Bipedal dinosaur with long sharp teeth in a massive jaw, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, short arms, with a feathered mullet and tail.
Enormous teeth in a massive jaw, fierce eyes, and a powerful frame to drive it forward, short arms with large claws, with a feathered mullet and tail.
A fast moving bipedal dinosaur about the size of a turkey.  Its teeth and claws are small but sharp.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich with a long stiff tail.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks somewhat like a reptilian ostrich with a small toothless beak and curved claws good for climbing.
A small, feathered bipedal dinosaur with a long feathered tail.
A large feathered bipedal dinosaur with a pot-bellied stomach and a long neck.  Sharp claws extend from its dexterous hands.
A large feathered bipedal dinosaur with a long neck, a beak and a large head crest.  Sharp claws extend from its dexterous hands.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.
A medium-sized bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  At the end of each foot is a large sickle-like claw.
A large bipedal dinosaur with feathered arms, a long tail, and scythe-like claws.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  Small, hooked claws emerge from its feet and hands.  The teeth are large and sharp and the jaws look strong.
A small bipedal dinosaur covered with feathers.  At the end of each foot is a large sickle-like claw.  Its eyes suggest intelligence.
A bipedal dinosaur about the size of a chicken.  It darts around quickly and has long arms for grabbing what it desires.  It's holding something.
A large bipedal plant eating dinosaur with a long neck and tail and leathery skin.
Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a whip-like tail and two rows of tall spines running down the neck and back.
Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a long, whip-like tail.  The head is upright and the neck looks like it would make a good strong club.
Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with bulky torso and long, whip-like tail.
Huge, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with a long, whip-like tail.
Huge four-legged dinosaur with a square head and a shorter neck and tail than similar dinosaurs.
Massive, long-necked, four-legged dinosaur with longer forelegs and a whip-like tail.
Gigantic four-legged dinosaur with a long neck and spiked tail protected by natural bone armor.
Small, four-legged dinosaur with five rows of protective plates running down its back.
A huge slow quadruped dinosaur with plates on its back, and a spiked tail.
This armored dinosaur looks like a giant prehistoric armadillo.  Its tail ends in a spiked club of bone.
This armored dinosaur looks like a giant prehistoric armadillo.  Its tail ends in a massive spiked club of bone.
This heavily armored dinosaur looks like a giant prehistoric armadillo.
This heavily armored dinosaur looks like a giant prehistoric armadillo with long bony spikes.
A large feathered dinosaur with four strong legs, broad shoulders and a pointed beak.  It moves slowly but with enormous strength.
A bulky, beaked dinosaur with hooved front legs and strong clawed back legs.
A huge mottled dinosaur with four legs, a narrow beak, and a curved head crest.
A huge scaly dinosaur with a thick neck and tail and hooves.  Has a short beak and a tall head crest.
A huge scaly dinosaur with hooves and long heavy tail.  Has a flat beak, thick nose, and small spiky head crest.
A huge scaly dinosaur with a broad toothless beak.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur, standing as tall as a human.  It looks like a reptilian ostrich with a round hard-looking domed head.
A small rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest studded with small horns and a hooked beak.
A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest from which two curved horns and a broad bony nose emerge.
A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a tall bony crest from which four long horns and a short nose horn emerge.
A massive rhino-like dinosaur with an ornate spiked neck crest and two long horns curving up and to the sides from above its eyes.
A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a tall bony crest from which two long wicked horns emerge.
A massive rhino-like dinosaur with a bony crest from which three large horns emerge.
A feathered bipedal dinosaur with long claws about the size of a turkey.
A feathered flying reptile over three feet long, with short wings and a big colorful beak.
A large feathered flying reptile, with a long pointed toothless beak and a long pointy head crest.
A huge feathered flying reptile, with a long pointed toothless beak and a long stiff neck.
A huge aquatic reptile about the size of a small house, with a ferocious crocodile-like head and powerful swimming fins.
